title: Japanese LCS gets more viewers then OPL.
body:
And Japanese server is younger, it's Japanese and does not allow english text in chat, the commentary is in Japanese, this obviously makes it less appealing for viewers who do not speak Japanese. (most twitch users).

Even with all this against it it still doubles Oceania's viewers.

http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesjp

This server is a joke, it's half chinese, known for being the most toxic server (and the worst skill wise).

Should have just kept Rich Gang OPL was getting 10k+ viewers a year ago when Rich Gang played. Now it's lucky to pull 2k.
